longDescription: Whether you struggle to sleep on your side, reach overhead, or swing a racket, our shoulder specialists combine imaging, orthobiologics, and physio to reset the rotator cuff. We calm inflammation, repair tendon fibres, and rebuild scapular stability so you get back to lifting, serving, or hugging without hesitation.

faq.answer: Light band work begins within 2 weeks; pressing or overhead lifting once strength goals are met, typically by week 8-10.
faq.question: When can I return to the gym?
Will I need a sling?
faq.answer: We provide a sling for comfort for 24-48 hours but encourage early controlled movement.

overview.content: We start with ultrasound/MRI review and scapular mechanics testing. Depending on findings we deliver PRP, adipose, or BMAC into the supra/infraspinatus, biceps anchor, or subacromial space. Rehab focuses on rotator cuff endurance, scapular control, and posture to keep gains long-term.
